name: Krush
details:
Bitcrusher / Sample Rate ReducerKRUSH is a compact-sized bitcrusher sample rate reducer stompbox.
This pedal features a variable, flexible and sweet-sounding digital downsampler with 3 different modes: Radio simulator, neutral mode, and vintage phonograph simulator. Each mode downgrades the original signal in avery musical fashion. 
http://www.hotoneaudio.com/products/skyline/frequency/107.html
